title: Decision for chemistry
creator_credit: MPO Productions, Monsanto Chemical Company and Sidney Meyers
brief_description: Demonstrates the importance of the chemical industry and its role in everyday living. Mentions the development of fire-resistant materials, treatment of soil with phosphates and Krilium products; the use of detergents in the laundry industry; the development of new textile fibres; and research on radio-active materials. For modern youth, with an enquiring mind, wonderful opportunities for a worth-while career are offered by the chemical industry.
